item.title: Visualizing Topics of 74th Congress Senate Bills and Joint Resolutions
item.description: Visualizing Topics of 74th Congress Senate Bills and Joint Resolutions # Note: This code is available to experiment with on Binder in a notebook with the filename tmr.ipynb. Be sure to check out the ner_mapping.ipynb notebook as well, in which I create a heatmap of states mentioned in Senate bills and joint resolutions during the 74th Congress. In LS 562: Digital Libraries, we studied the application of machine learning tools to text analysis problems.
